definition: The study of the movements and relative positions of celestial bodies and their supposed influence on human affairs.

example: After 1973, astrophysics research at Nanjing University was revived.
example_meaning: Sau năm 1973, nghiên cứu vật lý thiên văn tại Đại học Nam Kinh đã được hồi sinh.
definition: The branch of astronomy or physics that deals with the physical properties of celestial bodies and with the interaction between matter and radiation in celestial bodies and in the space between them.

example: These discoveries suggest that Earth-like planets may be only the tip of the astrobiological iceberg.
example_meaning: Những điều này cho thấy các hành tinh như Trái đất có thể chỉ là bề nổi của tảng băng sinh vật học vũ trụ .
definition: the study of life anywhere in the universe, including the Earth http://science.nasa.gov/planetary-science/astrobiology/
